reasoning: Familial Tremor (Essential Tremor with familial onset) measured as prevalence, not incidence, since it is a chronic lifelong neurological condition. Global prevalence estimated at ~1% (10,000 per 100k) based on population-based epidemiological studies.
source: Bain PG et al. (2011). Essential tremor. In: Marsden CD, Fahn S, eds. Movement Disorders. Butterworth-Heinemann.
